translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of essential nature as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of all phenomena as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of defining characteristics as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of the nonapprehension of phenomena as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of existence as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence and existence as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the four applications of mindfulness as having a real nature, or as not having a real nature.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the four right efforts, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the four legs of manifestation, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: dbang po lnga smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dbang po lnga smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the five spiritual faculties, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: stobs lnga smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs lnga smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the five powers, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the seven factors of enlightenment, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the noble eightfold path, considering it as existent or nonexistent.🔽He does not become attached to the four noble truths, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: bsam @57b gtan bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam @57b gtan bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the four meditations, considering them as existent or nonexistent.

original: tshad med pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the four immeasurables as either existent or nonexistent.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the four formless absorptions as either existent or nonexistent.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the eight deliverances as either existent or nonexistent.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the nine serial steps of meditative absorption as either existent or nonexistent.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation as either existent or nonexistent.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the clairvoyances as either existent or nonexistent.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the meditative stabilities as either existent or nonexistent.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the dhāraṇī gateways as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the ten powers of the tathāgatas as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the four fearlessnesses as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: byams pa chen po smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽snying rje chen po smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par @58a *//
analyzed: byams pa chen po smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do // snying rje chen po smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par @58a *//
translated: He is not attached to great love as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: chags pa med do //
analyzed: chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to great compassion as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the fruit of stream enterer as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.🔽They are not attached to the fruit of once-returner as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the fruit of non-returner as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the state of a worthy one as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: rang byang chub smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod pa 'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the knowledge of path aspects as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the knowledge of all aspects as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to form as isolated or not isolated.

original: tshor ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do; ;'du shes dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do; ;'du shes dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that perceptions are empty or not empty.

original: 'du byed dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that formative predispositions are empty or not empty.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that consciousness is empty or not empty.

original: mig dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rna ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽sna dben pa 'am mi @58b dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // rna ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // sna dben pa 'am mi @58b dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that the eyes are empty or not empty.🔽They are not attached to the idea that the ears are empty or not empty.🔽They are not attached to the idea that the nose is empty or not empty.

original: lce dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that the tongue is empty or not empty.

original: lus dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that the body is empty or not empty.

original: yid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that the mental faculty is empty or not empty.

original: gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the idea that sights are empty or not empty.

original: sgra dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽dri dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sgra dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // dri dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to sound as being isolated or not isolated.🔽He is not attached to smell as being isolated or not isolated.

original: ro dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ro dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to taste as being isolated or not isolated.

original: reg dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to feeling as being isolated or not isolated.

original: chos dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to mental phenomena as being isolated or not isolated.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact as being something that can be characterized as ‘empty’ or ‘not empty.’🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact as being something that can be characterized as ‘empty’ or ‘not empty.’🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact as being something that can be characterized as ‘empty’ or ‘not empty.’🔽He does not become attached to the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact as being something that can be characterized as ‘empty’ or ‘not empty.’🔽

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the feeling that arises from the contact of the ear … the feeling that arises from the contact of the nose … the feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue … the feeling that arises from the contact of the body … the feeling that arises from the contact of the mind as being a self or not a self, empty or not empty, with or without inherent nature, calm or not calm, isolated or not isolated.

original: sa'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: chu'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: me'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the space element …🔽the consciousness element as being a self or not a self, empty or not empty, with or without inherent nature, calm or not calm, isolated or not isolated.

original: rlung gi khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the element of wind as being isolated or not isolated.

original: nam mkha'i khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par @59b chags pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par @59b chags pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the element of space as being isolated or not isolated.🔽He does not become attached to the element of consciousness as being isolated or not isolated.

original: ma rig pa dben pa 'am mi dben bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa dben pa 'am mi dben bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to ignorance as being isolated or not isolated.

original: 'du byed dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to volitional factors as being isolated or not isolated.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to consciousness as being isolated or not isolated.

original: ming dang gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to name and form as being isolated or not isolated.

analyzed: skye mched drug dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: reg pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: tshor ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: sred pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: len pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: srid pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: skye ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: rga shi dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not become attached to the perfection of effort as being empty or not empty.🔽He does not become attached to the perfection of meditation as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'am mi dben par @60a *//

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

translated: they do not settle down on it.

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as being empty or not empty.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as being empty or not empty.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of no beginning or end as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of nonapprehension as being empty or not empty.🔽They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings as being empty or not empty.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of things as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

original: dbang po lnga dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dbang po lnga dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the five faculties as being empty or not empty.

original: stobs lnga dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs lnga dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the five powers as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the noble eightfold path as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four noble truths as being empty or not empty.

analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the three gateways to liberation as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four fearlessnesses as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty.🔽He is not attached to the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being empty or not empty

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @61a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @61a *//
translated: They do not settle down on the emptiness meditative stabilization, signless meditative stabilization, or wishless meditative stabilization as being entities or non-entities.🔽They do not settle down on the five eyes as being entities or non-entities.🔽They do not settle down on the six superknowledges as being entities or non-entities.

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the four fearlessnesses as being entities or non-entities.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do // gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the four detailed and thorough knowledges as being entities or non-entities.🔽They do not settle down on the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha as being entities or non-entities.🔽They do not settle down on the knowledge of all aspects as being entities or non-entities.🔽They do not settle down on the knowledge of paths as being entities or non-entities.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do; ;so so yang dag dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do; ;so so yang dag dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the knowledge of all aspects as being entities or non-entities.

original: byams pa chen po dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the great love is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: snying rje chen po dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the great compassion is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the result of stream enterer is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the result of once-returner is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the result of non-returner is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: the state of a worthy one is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion,

original: rang byang chub dben @61b pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub dben @61b pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not attached to either seclusion or lack of seclusion.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa 'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is not attached to being isolated or not isolated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not attached to being isolated or not isolated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang bzhin med pa'i chos ni /🔽rtag ces bya ba'am /🔽mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i chos ni / rtag ces bya ba'am / mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: A dharma that is without an intrinsic nature🔽cannot be said to be permanent

original: des zhes bya ba 'am /🔽sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am; bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba 'am / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am; bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or impermanent,🔽or to be suffering or not suffering,

original: bdag med ces bya ba'am /🔽zhi zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya ba'am / zhi zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or to have a self or not have a self,

original: ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am /🔽stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am / stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or to be calm or not calm,

original: mi stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or to be empty or not empty,

original: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am; mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am /🔽smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am; mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am / smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am /
translated: or to be with a sign or signless,

original: smon pa med ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: smon pa med ces bya ba'am /
translated: or to be having aspirations or lacking aspirations,

original: dben zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dben zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or to be isolated or not isolated.

original: mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
translated: It cannot be said to be fully awakened.

original: ngo bo nyid ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni /
translated: An intrinsic nature

original: ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par bsgrub par mi nus te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par bsgrub par mi nus te /
translated: It cannot be accomplished by its very essence.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: practicing the perfection of concentration,🔽practicing the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: practicing the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: practicing the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni /
translated: and practicing the perfection of generosity

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: will stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs @62a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs @62a *//
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni /
translated: The four-division army of a wheel-turning king

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro'o //
translated: will go wherever the wheel-turning king goes.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, these five perfections follow after the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will stand where the knowledge of all aspects is.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is just as

original: dper na / kha lo sgyur ba ni /
analyzed: dper na / kha lo sgyur ba ni /
translated: a charioteer

original: rta zung bzhi ba'i shing rta la zhon zhing lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o //
analyzed: rta zung bzhi ba'i shing rta la zhon zhing lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o //
translated: rides in a chariot with four horses yoked to it and travels on a level road.

original: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i kha lo bsgyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o ////
analyzed: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i kha lo bsgyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o ////
translated: In the same way, the perfection of wisdom, the charioteer of the five perfections, travels on a level road to where the knowledge of all aspects is.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya nga dgu pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya nga dgu pa //
translated: Volume 209

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ni /
translated: what is the path for bodhisattva great beings?

original: gang lags / lam ma lags pa ni /
analyzed: gang lags / lam ma lags pa ni /
translated: What is not the path?

original: gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la nyan thos kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la nyan thos kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin no //
translated: “The path of the śrāvakas is not the path of bodhisattva great beings for attaining the state of a knower of all aspects.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ni /
translated: The path of the pratyekabuddhas

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ma yin no //
translated: is not the path of bodhisattva great beings.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni /
translated: The six perfections that are preceded by the perfection of wisdom are

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems @62b dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems @62b dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam ste /
translated: the path of bodhisattva great beings for attaining the state of a knower of all aspects.

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam dang / 'di ni lam ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam dang / 'di ni lam ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is the path of bodhisattva great beings and this is not the path.”🔽Subhūti asked,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam dang / lam ma lags par ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam dang / lam ma lags par ston pa ni /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: For the bodhisattva great beings it is present for the sake of a great meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin to /
analyzed: de de bzhin to /
translated: It is so!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: lam dang / lam ma yin pa ston pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: lam dang / lam ma yin pa ston pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: is present for the sake of the great meaning for the bodhisattva great beings because it teaches the path and what is not the path.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of immeasurable meaning for the bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don grangs med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la don grangs med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas te /
translated: is present for the sake of innumerable meaning for the bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: don de'ang brjod mod kyi /
analyzed: don de'ang brjod mod kyi /
translated: does indeed express that meaning,

original: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: but it does not grasp form.

original: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp feelings.

original: 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp perceptions.

original: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp volitions.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp consciousness.

original: mig yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mig yongs su mi 'dzin to //

original: rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽sna yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin to // sna yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the ears.🔽He does not grasp the nose.

original: lce yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lce yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the tongue.

original: lus yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the body.

original: yid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the thinking-mind.

original: @63a *// gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: @63a *// gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp sights.

original: sgra yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽dri yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: sgra yongs su mi 'dzin to // dri yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp sounds.🔽He does not grasp smells.

original: ro yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽reg yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ro yongs su mi 'dzin to // reg yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp tastes.🔽He does not grasp tangibles.

original: chos yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: chos yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp ear consciousness.🔽He does not grasp nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the consciousness of the body.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a form, and the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear, a sound, and the ear consciousness.🔽He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the nose, a smell, and the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the tongue, a taste, and the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the body, a tangible object, and the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the contact that arises from the coming together of the mind, a mental object, and the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a form, and the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear, a sound, and the ear consciousness.🔽He does not grasp the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the nose, a smell, and the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the tongue, a taste, and the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by means of the eye.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the feeling that arises from the condition of contact by means of the mind.

original: sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the water element.

analyzed: @63b me'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to // rlung gi khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the fire element.🔽He does not grasp the wind element.

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the space element.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin to //

original: ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ma rig pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp ignorance.

original: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to //

analyzed: skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin to //

original: reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //

original: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //

original: sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp craving.

original: len pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: len pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp appropriation.

original: srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the world.

original: skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp birth.

original: rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the perfection of morality.🔽He does not grasp the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the perfection of vigor.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the perfection of wisdom.🔽He does not grasp inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They do not fully grasp the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽mtha' las 'das @64a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // mtha' las 'das @64a *//
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of its own mark.🔽They do not fully grasp the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of essence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the emptiness of the essence of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽dbang po lnga yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to // dbang po lnga yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four legs of miraculous power.🔽They do not fully grasp the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: stobs lnga yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: They do not fully grasp the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @64b smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @64b smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the ten tathāgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin to // byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He does not grasp great love.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin to // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not grasp the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not grasp the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: they do not appropriate the fruit of non-returning;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: they do not appropriate the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: they do not appropriate a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: they do not stand in appropriating the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: This perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su thob par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su thob par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: does not cause the bodhisattva great beings to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: nyan thos kyis 'dor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyis 'dor ba ma yin no //
translated: It does not cause them to fall from the śrāvaka level;

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dor ba ma yin no //
translated: it does not cause them to fall from the pratyekabuddha level;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa  pa nyid dang smod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa  pa nyid dang smod pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not cause them to fall from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar chos kyi gnas nyid tshad mar byas na /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi gnas nyid tshad mar byas na /
translated: Thus, taking the true nature of dharmas as the measure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: this perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang yang skyed pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos gang yang skyed pa ma yin /
translated: does not produce any dharma at all;

original: 'gog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not stop any dharma.

original: gsol pa / @65a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / @65a *//
translated: Subhūti said,🔽“Lord, this perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang skyed pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang skyed pa ma lags /
translated: if this perfection of wisdom does not produce any dharma at all,

original: 'gog pa ma lags na /
analyzed: 'gog pa ma lags na /
translated: does not make any dharma stop,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi /
translated: how should bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom give gifts?

original: ji ltar tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi /🔽ji ltar bzod pa bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi / ji ltar bzod pa bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they guard morality?🔽How should they cultivate patience?

original: ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi /
translated: How should they make an effort?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: How should they become absorbed in concentration?

original: ji ltar shes rab bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o //
translated: “You should give gifts with the knowledge of all aspects as your reference point.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: You should guard morality with the knowledge of all aspects as your reference point.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He should cultivate patience, focusing on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o //
translated: He should make an effort at perseverance, focusing on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: He should enter into the meditative stabilities, focusing on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te shes rab bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te shes rab bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He should cultivate wisdom, focusing on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: And he should dedicate those wholesome roots, making common cause with all sentient beings, to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de @65b dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de @65b dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na /
translated: When the bodhisattva great being has thus dedicated those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the cultivation of the six perfections is completed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The cultivation of love by a bodhisattva great being is

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great being who is not separated from the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba ste /
translated: is not separated from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: a bodhisattva great being who wants to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should practice the six perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings who practice the six perfections

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: having completed all the roots of virtue will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: Subhūti, therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings should make an effort in the six perfections.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bgyi /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: how should bodhisattva great beings make an effort in the six perfections?”

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar gzugs ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar gzugs ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Su­bhūti, here bodhisattva great beings should not be endowed with form,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor should they be devoid of it.

original: tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with feeling,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽'du shes ldan @66a *//
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / 'du shes ldan @66a *//
translated: nor should they be devoid of it.

original: pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with perception,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor should they be devoid of it.

original: 'du byed ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with formative predispositions,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor should they be devoid of them.

original: rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with consciousness,🔽nor should they be devoid of it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin; mig ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin; mig ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with the eyes,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor should they be devoid of them.

original: rna ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They should not be endowed with the ears,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor should they be devoid of them.

original: sna ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sna ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not associated with the nose.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽lce ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / lce ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from the nose.🔽It is not associated with the tongue.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽lus ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / lus ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from the tongue.🔽It is not associated with the body.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽yid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / yid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from the body.🔽It is not associated with the mind.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from the mind.🔽It is not associated with form.

original: gzugs ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽sgra ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / sgra ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from form.🔽It is not associated with sound.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽dri ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / dri ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not dissociated from sound.🔽It is not associated with smell.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽ro ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / ro ldan pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The feeling that arises from eye contact is neither associated nor non-associated.🔽The feeling that arises from ear contact is neither associated nor non-associated.🔽The feeling that arises from nose contact is neither associated nor non-associated.🔽The feeling that arises from tongue contact is neither associated nor non-associated.🔽The feeling that arises from body contact is neither associated nor non-associated.🔽The feeling that arises from mind contact is neither associated nor non-associated.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ldan pa'ang ma yin /

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /

translated: The feeling that arises from the union of tongue, contact, and attention is not connected and is not disconnected.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽the four assurances,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽the great love,

original: byams pa chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽snying rje chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽snying rje chen po ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the great compassion,🔽or the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is it that it does not possess them.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the fruit of entering the stream,🔽nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,🔽nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses arhatship,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: rang byang chub ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rang byang chub ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses individual enlightenment,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the knowledge of path aspects,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that it possesses the knowledge of all aspects,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is it that it does not possess it.

original: zhes bya bar rab tu brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya bar rab tu brtag par bya ste /
translated: It should be imagined in this way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, should not exert himself thus:

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
translated: 'I will stand in form,🔽I will stand in feeling,

original: tshor ba @69a *//
analyzed: tshor ba @69a *//
translated: I will stand in perception,

original: la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
analyzed: la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
translated: I will stand in the formations,🔽I will stand in consciousness,

original: 'du shes la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //🔽'du byed la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o // 'du byed la gnas par bya'o //

original: zhes brtson par mi bya'o; ;rnam par shes pa la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brtson par mi bya'o; ;rnam par shes pa la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
translated: I will stand in form,🔽I will stand in sound,🔽I will stand in smell,🔽I will stand in taste,🔽I will stand in touch,🔽I will stand in dharmas,

original: mig la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
translated: I will stand in the eye-consciousness,

analyzed: rna ba la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson bar mi bya'o //
translated: I will stand in the ear-consciousness,

original: sna la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sna la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //

original: lce la gnas par bya'o //🔽zhes brtson par mi bya'o /
analyzed: lce la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o /
translated: I will stand in the tongue-consciousness,

original: lus la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: lus la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I will stand in the body-consciousness,🔽I will stand in the mind-consciousness,🔽I will stand in eye-contact,🔽I will stand in ear-contact,🔽I will stand in nose-contact,🔽I will stand in tongue-contact,🔽I will stand in body-contact,🔽I will stand in mind-contact,🔽I will stand in the results of wholesome and unwholesome actions,🔽I will stand in the fruit of Streamwinner,🔽I will stand in the fruit of Once-returner,🔽I will stand in the fruit of Non-returner,🔽I will stand in the fruit of Arhatship,🔽I will stand in the fruit of Pratyekabuddha-enlightenment,🔽I will stand in the knowledge of all modes,🔽I will stand in the knowledge of all modes and then make an end of ill.'

analyzed: zhes brtson par mi bya'o //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par bya'o // zhes brtson par mi bya'o //

translated: In that way, without standing anywhere, a bodhisattva great being should fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / skyes bu zhig shing tog aa 'bra'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / skyes bu zhig shing tog aa 'bra'am /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: pa na sa za bar 'dod na /🔽des shing tog aa 'bra'am /
analyzed: pa na sa za bar 'dod na / des shing tog aa 'bra'am /
translated: For example, if a person wants to eat mangoes🔽or breadfruit,

original: shing tog pa na sa bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: shing tog pa na sa bskyed par bya'o //
translated: he should plant mango or breadfruit trees.

original: bskyed nas kyang dus dus su chus bcu'o //
analyzed: bskyed nas kyang dus dus su chus bcu'o //
translated: and when it has grown, it is watered from time to time.

original: gnod pa bsal to //🔽de rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis mthar gyis 'phel nas shing tog aam bra 'am /
analyzed: gnod pa bsal to // de rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i dbang gis mthar gyis 'phel nas shing tog aam bra 'am /
translated: and the damage is removed.

original: @74b shing tog pa na sa yod par 'gyur te /🔽de shing tog aam bra 'am /
analyzed: @74b shing tog pa na sa yod par 'gyur te / de shing tog aam bra 'am /
