translated: and by the power of the coming together of causes and conditions, it gradually grows and becomes a mango or rose-apple fruit.🔽and there is a mango or rose-apple fruit.

original: shing tog pa na sa za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing tog pa na sa za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and he eats the mango or rose-apple fruit.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab ste /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should train in the six perfections

original: sems can rnams sbyin pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams sbyin pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: and help beings with giving,

original: tshul khrims kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //🔽bzod pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o // bzod pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: help them with morality,🔽help them with patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: help them with perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: help them with concentration,🔽and help them with wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyis rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: and should be sustained by wisdom.

original: sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: One should liberate beings from cyclic existence.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: Subhūti, therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / snying po byang chub tu 'dug par 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / snying po byang chub tu 'dug par 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
translated: a bodhisattva great being who wants to not be led by others, who wants to purify a buddhafield, who wants to sit on the seat of awakening, who wants to turn the wheel of the Dharma, should train in the six perfections.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: zhes gsung ngam /
analyzed: zhes gsung ngam /
translated: do you say that the perfection of wisdom should train in the perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: zhes smra'o // chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur bar 'thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol @75a *//
analyzed: zhes smra'o // chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur bar 'thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol @75a *//
translated: Thus it is said.

original: tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to attain mastery over all phenomena should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: zhes smra'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: zhes smra'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gis chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba'i sa thob par 'gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gis chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba'i sa thob par 'gyur pa de ni /
translated: That which leads to attaining the stage of mastery over all phenomena

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: This perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
translated: is the gateway to all phenomena.🔽It is like this:

original: 'di ltar dper na /🔽rgya mtsho chen po ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na / rgya mtsho chen po ni /
translated: for example,

original: chu klung thams cad kyi sgo'o //
analyzed: chu klung thams cad kyi sgo'o //
translated: the great ocean is the gateway for all rivers.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
translated: In the same way, the perfection of wisdom is the gateway for all phenomena.

original: gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: Whether it is a person belonging to the vehicle of the hearers,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: the vehicle of the solitary buddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: or the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, they should all train in this perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in the perfection of morality.🔽They should train in the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o;/
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o;/
translated: They should train in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o // nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They should train in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in outer emptiness.🔽They should train in inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas @75b byas  stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas @75b byas  stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽“One should train in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽“One should train in the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of nonentities.🔽“One should train in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //🔽dbang po lnga la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o // dbang po lnga la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the four legs of supernatural power.🔽“One should train in the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs lnga la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the seven factors of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bya'o //🔽tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bya'o // tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the four concentrations.🔽“One should train in the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o //🔽mngon par shes @76a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o //🔽mngon par shes @76a *//
translated: “One should train in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.🔽“One should train in the ten tathāgata powers.

original: pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: pa rnams la bslab par bya'o // ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: one should train in the perfections.🔽one should train in the meditative stabilizations.🔽one should train in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //🔽byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o // byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽One should train in great love.

original: snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “One should train in the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bya'o // dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the result of non-returner.🔽One should train in the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the knowledge of paths. One should train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / 'phong gi slob dpon lag tshod dang 'byor ba'i gzhu thogs pa ni /
analyzed: dper na / 'phong gi slob dpon lag tshod dang 'byor ba'i gzhu thogs pa ni /
translated: A master archer who shoots a bow that is well-strung and well-fitted

original: dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyis thub par dka'o //
analyzed: dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyis thub par dka'o //
translated: is hard for enemies and adversaries to overcome.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka'o //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom is hard for Māra or the gods in Māra’s retinue to overcome.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: Subhūti, therefore

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @76b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @76b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: a bodhisattva great being who wants to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: The Blessed Buddhas of the past, present, and future pay attention to those who practice the perfection of wisdom in this way.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: how do the Blessed Buddhas pay attention to bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of generosity?

original: ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they pay attention to those practicing the perfection of ethical discipline?🔽How do they pay attention to those practicing the perfection of patience?

original: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they pay attention to those practicing the perfection of perseverance?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they pay attention to those practicing the perfection of concentration?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of the perfection of wisdom?🔽How does he intend the practice of inner emptiness?

original: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of outer emptiness?

original: ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of inner and outer emptiness?

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of the emptiness of emptiness?

original: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of great emptiness?🔽How does he intend the practice of ultimate emptiness?

original: ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of conditioned emptiness?🔽How does he intend the practice of unconditioned emptiness?

original: ji @77a *// ltar mtha' las 'das la stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji @77a *// ltar mtha' las 'das la stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend the practice of the emptiness of what transcends limits?

original: ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of emptiness that is not a beginning or an end?

original: ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of emptiness that is not discarded?

original: ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spong pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spong pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of nature?

original: ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of its own mark?🔽How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of nonapprehension?

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of nonthings?🔽How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of essence?

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How do they focus on the practice of the emptiness of the essence of nonthings?

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the applications of mindfulness?

original: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the right efforts?

original: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar dbang po rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar dbang po rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the legs of miraculous power?🔽How does he intend to practice the faculties?

original: ji ltar stobs rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar stobs rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the powers?

original: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the branches of awakening?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod @77b pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod @77b pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the noble truths?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the meditative stabilities?

original: ji ltar tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the formless?

original: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the formless absorptions?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the eight aspects of liberation?

original: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the nine serial steps of meditative absorption?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation?

original: ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the [five] kinds of superknowledge?

original: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the meditative stabilities?

original: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the ten powers of the tathāgatas?

original: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to teach them to practice the four fearlessnesses?

original: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar byams pa chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar byams pa chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the four right efforts?🔽How does he intend to practice the four legs of miraculous power?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the five powers?🔽How does he intend to practice the five strengths?🔽How does he intend to practice the seven aspects of enlightenment?🔽How does he intend to practice the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la @78a *//🔽spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la @78a *// spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the four applications of mindfulness?🔽How does he intend to practice the four right efforts?

original: ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /🔽ji ltar rang byang chub la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad / ji ltar rang byang chub la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the four legs of miraculous power?🔽How does he intend to practice the five powers?🔽How does he intend to practice the five strengths?🔽How does he intend to practice the seven aspects of enlightenment?

original: ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: How does he intend to practice the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad /
translated: “How do they intend to practice the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
translated: The Lord said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: “Subhūti, here the lord buddhas intend to practice the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings

original: ci nas kyang sbyin pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang sbyin pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: so that they do not apprehend a gift.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: They intend to practice the perfection of morality

original: ci nas kyang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: so that they do not apprehend morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: They intend to practice the perfection of patience

original: ci nas kyang bzod pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang bzod pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: so that they do not apprehend patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: They intend to practice the perfection of perseverance🔽so that they do not apprehend perseverance.

original: ci nas kyang brtson 'grus mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang brtson 'grus mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend striving.

original: ci nas kyang bsam gtan mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽shes rab kyi @78b pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bsam gtan mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // shes rab kyi @78b pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend concentration.

original: ci nas kyang shes rab mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang shes rab mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend wisdom.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend inner and outer emptiness.

original: ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He attends to the practice of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of emptiness,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of great extent,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de; ci nas kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de; ci nas kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: attending to the practice of the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: chen po stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // don dam pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: attending to the practice of the emptiness of specific characteristics,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of the absence of intrinsic nature,🔽attending to the practice of the emptiness of the absence of the intrinsic nature of non-entities,🔽attending to the practice of the perfection of giving,

original: ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: attending to the practice of the perfection of morality,🔽attending to the practice of the perfection of patience,🔽attending to the practice of the perfection of perseverance,🔽attending to the practice of the perfection of concentration,🔽attending to the practice of the perfection of wisdom,🔽attending to the practice of the applications of mindfulness,

original: ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: attending to the practice of the right efforts,🔽attending to the practice of the legs of miraculous power,🔽attending to the practice of the faculties,🔽attending to the practice of the powers,🔽attending to the practice of the branches of enlightenment,🔽attending to the practice of the noble eightfold path,🔽attending to the practice of the result of stream enterer,🔽attending to the practice of the result of once-returner,🔽attending to the practice of the result of non-returner,🔽attending to the practice of the state of a worthy one,🔽attending to the practice of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,🔽attending to the practice of the ten powers of a tathāgata,🔽attending to the practice of the four fearlessnesses,🔽attending to the practice of the four kinds of unobstructed understanding,🔽attending to the practice of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽attending to the practice of the thirty-two major marks of a great person,🔽attending

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de; ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de; ci nas kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of what is not rejected,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,🔽He sets out to practice the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,🔽He sets out to practice the emptiness of all things,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: ci nas kyang mtha' las @79a *//
analyzed: ci nas kyang mtha' las @79a *//
translated: and he does so without apprehending anything,🔽He sets out to practice the emptiness of nonapprehending,

original: 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of essential nature,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of the unobservable,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: ci nas kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of the essential nature of existence,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets out to practice the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence and existence,🔽and he does so without apprehending anything.

original: ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He has the intention to practice the emptiness of essential nature,🔽and he has the intention to practice the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: and he has the intention to practice the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽and he has the intention to practice the emptiness of nonobservation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: and he has the intention to practice the emptiness of nonentities,🔽and he has the intention to practice the emptiness of intrinsic natures.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs @79b pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs @79b pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets his mind on the practice of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽He sets his mind on the non-apprehension of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets his mind on the practice of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: ci nas kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets his mind on the non-apprehension of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets his mind on the practice of the applications of mindfulness.

original: ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets his mind on the non-apprehension of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets his mind on the practice of the right efforts.

original: ci nas kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He sets his mind on the non-apprehension of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He sets his mind on the practice of the legs of miraculous power.

original: ci nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽dbang po rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // dbang po rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the bases of supernatural power.

original: ci nas kyang dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽stobs rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // stobs rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the faculties.

original: ci nas kyang stobs rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang stobs rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the powers.

original: ci nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the limbs of awakening.

original: ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams spyod @80a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams spyod @80a *//
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the noble truths.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the meditative stabilizations.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the four fearlessnesses.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He has the intention of not apprehending the noble truths in any way.

original: bsam gtan rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He has the intention of practicing the meditative stabilizations.

original: ci nas kyang bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He has the intention of not apprehending the meditative stabilizations in any way.

original: tshad med pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He has the intention of practicing the immeasurables.

original: ci nas kyang tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad de //
analyzed: ci nas kyang tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad de //
translated: He has the intention of not apprehending the immeasurables in any way.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He has the intention of practicing the formless absorptions.

original: ci nas kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He has the intention of not apprehending the formless absorptions in any way.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He has the intention of practicing the eight deliverances.

original: ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He has the intention of not apprehending the eight deliverances in any way.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He has the intention of practicing the nine serial absorptions.

original: ci nas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks about the nine serial absorptions in such a way that they are not apprehended.🔽He thinks about the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness doors of liberation in such a way that they are not apprehended.

original: ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽mngon par shes pa @80b rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // mngon par shes pa @80b rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks about the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness doors of liberation in such a way that they are not apprehended.

original: ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // ting nge 'dzin rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He thinks about the superknowledges in such a way that they are not apprehended.🔽He thinks about the concentrations in such a way that they are not apprehended.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks about the doors of concentration in such a way that they are not apprehended.🔽He thinks about the doors of retention in such a way that they are not apprehended.

original: ci nas kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He attends to the dhāraṇī gateways without apprehending them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He attends to the practice of the ten powers of the tathāgatas

original: ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // mi 'jigs pa bzhi spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: without apprehending the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽He attends to the practice of the four fearlessnesses

original: ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: without apprehending the four fearlessnesses.🔽He attends to the practice of the four kinds of exact knowledge

original: ci nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: without apprehending the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: byams pa chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: byams pa chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He attends to the practice of great love

original: ci nas kyang byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: without apprehending great love.

original: snying rje chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He attends to the practice of great compassion🔽without apprehending great compassion.

original: ci nas kyang snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /🔽ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa de @81a *//
analyzed: ci nas kyang snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de / ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa de @81a *//
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend even great compassion.

original: ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: ci nas kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the result of stream enterer.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the result of once-returner.

original: ci nas kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: ci nas kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the result of non-returner.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend the state of a worthy one.🔽He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: ci nas kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He thinks in such a way that he does not apprehend unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He is intent on the practice of the state of a worthy one.

original: ci nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He is intent on the practice of the state of a worthy one in such a way that he does not apprehend a state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad do /
analyzed: rang byang chub spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad do /
translated: He is intent on the practice of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: ci nas kyang rang byang chub mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang rang byang chub mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He is intent on the practice of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening in such a way that he does not apprehend a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He is intent on the practice of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: ci nas kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He is intent on the practice of the knowledge of path aspects in such a way that he does not apprehend the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spyod pa la dgongs pa mdzad de /
translated: He is intent on the practice of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa de ltar dgongs pa mdzad do //
translated: He is intent on the practice of the knowledge of all aspects in such a way that he does not apprehend the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dgongs pa mdzad do ////
analyzed: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dgongs pa mdzad do ////
translated: He is intent on the bodhisattva great beings who do not apprehend in that way.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @81b pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @81b pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya drug cu pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya drug cu pa //
translated: Chapter 71

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the lord buddhas

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do // tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: do not consider the bodhisattva great beings in terms of form.🔽They do not consider them in terms of feeling.

original: 'du shes su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'du shes su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of perception.

original: 'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of consciousness.

original: mig tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽rna bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mig tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do // rna bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of the eyes.🔽They do not consider them in terms of the ears.

original: snar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: snar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of the nose.

original: lcer dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
analyzed: lcer dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
translated: They do not consider them in terms of the tongue.

original: lus su dgongs pa mi mdzad do; ;yid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
analyzed: lus su dgongs pa mi mdzad do; ;yid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
translated: They do not consider them in terms of the body. They do not consider them in terms of the thinking mind.

original: gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of form.

original: sgrar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽drir dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽ror dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: sgrar dgongs pa mi mdzad do // drir dgongs pa mi mdzad do // ror dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of sound.🔽They do not consider them in terms of smell.

original: reg tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: reg tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of taste.🔽They do not consider them in terms of feeling.

original: chos su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: chos su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not consider them in terms of dharmas.

original: mig gi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // sna'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of the ear consciousness.🔽He does not think of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of eye contact.🔽He does not think of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽lce'i 'dus @82a *//🔽te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // lce'i 'dus @82a *// te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of nose contact.🔽He does not think of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not think of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the condition of contact at the ear as the self.🔽He does not consider the condition of contact at the nose as the self.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the condition of contact at the tongue as the self.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the condition of contact at the body as the self.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the condition of contact at the mind as the self.

original: sa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: sa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the earth element as the self.

original: chu'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: chu'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the water element as the self.

original: me'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽rlung gi khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: me'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do // rlung gi khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the fire element as the self.🔽He does not consider the wind element as the self.

original: nam mkha'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do // rnam par shes pa'i khams su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider the space element as the self.🔽He does not consider the consciousness element as the self.

original: ma rig par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: ma rig par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider ignorance as the self.

original: 'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'du byed du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not consider volitional factors as the self.

original: rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend name-and-form.

original: skye mched drug tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: skye mched drug tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the six sense sources.

original: reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: reg par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend contact.

original: tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽sred par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: tshor bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do // sred par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend feeling.🔽He does not intend craving.

original: len par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽srid @82b par dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
analyzed: len par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // srid @82b par dgongs pa mi mdzad do /
translated: He does not intend grasping.🔽He does not intend becoming.

original: skye bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: skye bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend birth.

original: rga shir dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rga shir dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the perfection of moral discipline.🔽He does not intend the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dgongs pa mi mdzad do // nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the perfection of wisdom.🔽He does not intend inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽He does not intend the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do;/
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do;/
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽He does not intend the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽dngos po @83a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do // dngos po @83a *//
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽He does not intend the emptiness of things.

original: med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: med pa stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong bar dgongs pa mi mdzad do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the right efforts.🔽He does not intend the bases of supernatural power.

original: dbang por dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: dbang por dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the faculties.

original: stobs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: stobs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the limbs of awakening.

original: lam du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lam du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not intend the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: bsam gtan du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the meditative stabilizations.

original: tshad med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: tshad med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the formless absorptions.🔽He does not pay attention to the liberations.

original: rnam par thar par dgongs pa mi mdzad do; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par thar par dgongs pa mi mdzad do; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //🔽mtshan ma med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do // mtshan ma med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to emptiness.🔽He does not pay attention to signlessness.

original: smon pa med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: smon pa med par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to wishlessness.

original: mngon par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mngon par shes par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgor dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgor dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to fearlessness.

original: so so yang dag par rig par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen por dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: byams pa chen por dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to great love.

original: snying rje chen por dgongs @83b pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: snying rje chen por dgongs @83b pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rang byang chub tu dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgongs pa mi mdzad do //
translated: He does not pay attention to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bgyi la gang la'ang bslab par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bgyi la gang la'ang bslab par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, bodhisattva great beings should train in many situations, but should not train in anything at all.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, that is so, that is so.🔽It is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas mang por yang bslab par bya ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva should train in many topics,
