original: gang la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: but he should not train in anything at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba'i chos de dag mi dmigs so //
translated: Because those dharmas in which the bodhisattva mahāsattva should train are not apprehended.🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par bstan na /
translated: if the Tathāgata has taught these dharmas in brief and in detail,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag mdo dang rgyas par kun chub bar bgyi'o //
translated: then the bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should master these six perfections in brief and in detail.

original: kun chub par bgyis nas tshig gis shin tu goms par bgyi'o //🔽tshig gis shin tu goms par @84a *//
analyzed: kun chub par bgyis nas tshig gis shin tu goms par bgyi'o // tshig gis shin tu goms par @84a *//

analyzed: bgyis nas yid kyis rtogs par bgyi'o //

analyzed: de'ang ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi rgyu ba de ltar rtogs par bgyi'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

translated: The Blessed One said,

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what is the suchness of the body?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of form.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the eyes.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind.

original: 'jig pa mi dmigs /🔽gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jig pa mi dmigs / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of sights.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of sounds, odors, tastes, tangibles, and dharmas.

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid de /🔽de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid de / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of the earth element.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the eye constituent.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the form constituent and the eye-consciousness constituent.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear-consciousness constituent.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the nose constituent, the odor constituent, and the nose-consciousness constituent.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the tongue constituent, the taste constituent, and the tongue-consciousness constituent.

original: 'jig pa mi dmigs /🔽gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jig pa mi dmigs / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of the body constituent, the tangible constituent, and the body-consciousness constituent.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of the thinking-mind constituent.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the dharma constituent and the thinking-mind consciousness constituent.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of the perfection of giving.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of inner emptiness.

original: 'jig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: The suchness of the body is the suchness of outer emptiness, the suchness of inner and outer emptiness, the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness, the suchness of great emptiness, the suchness of ultimate emptiness, the suchness of the conditioned emptiness, the suchness of the unconditioned emptiness, the suchness of the endless emptiness, the suchness of the beginningless emptiness, the suchness

original: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: It is observed that things do not change into something else while they endure.🔽

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: This non-apprehension of form as other than its abiding in suchness is the suchness of form.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das @90b sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das @90b sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: In this the bodhisattva, the great being, should train.🔽Subhūti said, “Lord, what is the suchness of sound?🔽” The Lord said, “The suchness of sound is the suchness of nonproduction,🔽the suchness of nonrelinquishment,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: the suchness of nondefilement and nonpurification,🔽the suchness of nonabiding and nonextinction,🔽the suchness of nonattraction and nonrepulsion,

analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs / 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: the suchness of nonexistence,🔽the suchness of non-apprehension,🔽the suchness of non-definitiveness,🔽the suchness of non-differentiation,🔽the suchness of nonorigination,

original: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: the suchness of non-stopping,🔽the suchness of non-defilement,🔽the suchness of non-purification,🔽the suchness of non-substantiality,

analyzed: sgra'i de bzhin nyid de / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: the suchness of non-self,🔽the suchness of non-living beings,🔽the suchness of non-life,

analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: the suchness of non-personality,🔽the suchness of non-substantiality of persons,

analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs / 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: the suchness of non-production,🔽the suchness of non-stopping,🔽the suchness of non-defilement,🔽the suchness of non-purification,🔽the suchness of non-existence,🔽the suchness of non-apprehension,🔽the suchness of non-definitiveness,🔽the suchness of non-differentiation,🔽the suchness of non-origination,

original: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /

original: dri'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: the suchness of non-self,🔽the suchness of non-living beings,🔽the suchness of non-life,🔽the suchness of non-personality,🔽the suchness of non-substantiality of persons,🔽the suchness of non-production,🔽the suchness of non-stopping,🔽the suchness of non-defilement,🔽the suchness of non-purification,🔽the suchness of non-existence,🔽the suchness of non-apprehension,🔽the suchness of non-definitiveness,

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas should train in that.

analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “What is the suchness of form, Bhagavān?”

original: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /🔽'jig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs / 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: The Bhagavān replied, “Śāriputra, the suchness of form is the suchness of nonproduction.

analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: The suchness of nonproduction is the suchness of form.🔽The suchness of form is the suchness of all dharmas.

analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of all dharmas is the suchness of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied, “Śāriputra, the suchness of feeling is the suchness of nonproduction.

original: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /🔽'jig pa mi dmigs /🔽gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs / 'jig pa mi dmigs / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: The suchness of nonproduction is the suchness of feeling.🔽The suchness of feeling is the suchness of all dharmas.

original: reg gi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of all dharmas is the suchness of feeling.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas should train in that.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “What is the suchness of perception, Bhagavān?”

original: @91a *// chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: @91a *// chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: What is the suchness of phenomena?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs /🔽'jig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba mi dmigs / 'jig pa mi dmigs /
translated: “The suchness in which arising is not observed,🔽in which ceasing is not observed,

original: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'di ni /
translated: and in which anything other than abiding is not observed,
